name: Simmons_Upholstery_Miramar_Ash_Queen_Sleeper
description: Upgrade your living decor with the addition of this grey Simmons upholstery queen hide-a-bed featuring a transional track arm, non-reversible seat cushions, and accented with two 22-inch  toss pillows with a decorative design. Features: Hardwood frame, sinuous wire springs and high-density foam seat cushions for comfortable seating.
